issue.title: Update Multisense ladar and camera values to match hardware

content.raw:
for changing camera resolution and update rate, I re-enabled ROS topics [here, but this branch needs testing](#!/osrf/drcsim/commits/4ff59ccbfacd1287dcd55636fe5b3b1f027a8bf4).

In fact, I am not sure if this call is actually changing camera resolutions:

~~~
rostopic pub -1 /multisense/set_camera_resolution_mode std_msgs/Int32 '{data: 2}'
~~~

and

~~~
rostopic echo /multisense/camera/left/image_raw --noarr
gz topic -e /gazebo/default/atlas/head/stereo_camera/images | grep width
~~~

does not reflect updated resolution.

Testing with [this branch in gazebo_ros_pkgs](https://github.com/ros-simulation/gazebo_ros_pkgs/compare/indigo-devel...camera_info_dynamic_update?expand=1)
